title: The headset button cannot be used to control music playback
answer:
Check if there are any objects lodged in the gaps between the headset buttons that prevent the button from being pressed. Please remove any such objects on a regular basis. 

 Please use an original Huawei headset. Headsets made by other brands may be incompatible with Huawei phones, meaning that they cannot be used to control music playback. 

 Please contact the relevant app developer if you are not using the phone's default music player.
keywords: press, headset, button, control, unresponsive, listen to music, play music
